name: Recipe: Jewelry Soup
desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Jewelry Soup.

value.name: Snapdragon
value.desc: Can be eaten once cooked. As a spice, it can bring wonderful flavor to dishes.

value.name: Tofu
value.desc: Freshly made bean product that has a silky-smooth tender texture.

value.name: Lotus Head
value.desc: An aquatic plant native to Liyue that grows and blooms in pairs. One is fragrant, and the other bitter. It's said to make a good herbal medicine.

value.name: Jewelry Soup
value.desc: A simple vegetable soup. Snapdragon, tofu, and lotus seeds are put into boiling water and simmered. Jewelry Soup earned its luxurious name from the look of the ingredients used, but contrary to its name, the soup is commonly prepared and served in ordinary households.

value.text: <color=#ffffffd9>Obtained during Archon Quest Chapter I: Act I "Custodian of Clouds"</color>
